about_me_description: I'm a passionate web developer with a focus on Ruby on Rails, with a strong commitment to creating scalable and high-quality software solutions.
about_me_description_2: Since I entered the programming world, I discovered my passion for creating digital solutions that not only work, but also enchant users. With solid skills in front-end and back-end development, I'm able to translate creative concepts into robust and functional software products.
about_me_description_3: My main focus has been the Ruby on Rails platform, where I found a perfect combination of productivity and performance. Working with this technology allowed me to explore my creative potential while building scalable and high-quality applications.
